name: Digital wallet for woocommerce
author: SunArc

sections.description:
• Author: Suncart Store

“Digital wallet for woocommerce” plugin will allow the user to purchase the product through the wallet system.

This Plugin is useful for frontend users who can add the money into the wallet system via any payment methods and also can purchase the products through their wallet balance.

Features

-Frontend users can add the money from any payment method.
-Frontend user can add only $50 into the wallet for purchase
-Frontend users can purchase the products through the wallet system.
-This will work for registered users only.
-Add money into the wallet will be complete once order status is approved/completed from the admin side.
-Admin can check all transactions of wallet through backend side

License

This WordPress plugin is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 2 of the License, or any later version.
This WordPress plugin is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this WordPress plugin. If not, see.
sections.installation:
=Digital wallet for woocommerce=
1. Go to Plugins > Add New Plugin*, search for Digital wallet for woocommerce and click “Install now”
2. Alternative method, download the plugin and Upload the Digital wallet for woocommerce folder to the /wp-content/plugins/directory
3. Activate the plugin

OR, See detailed doc, how to install a WordPress plugin.
sections.faq:
How much money frontend users can add into their wallets ?

Currently users can add only $50 via this free plugin, to purchase unlimitied money with minimum and maximum add amount , kindly purchase paid plugin from suncart store

What are the free features available for this plugin?

Free features are
Frontend users can add the money from any payment method.
Frontend users can add only $50 into the wallet for purchase.
Frontend users can purchase the products through the wallet system.
This will work for registered users only.
Add money into the wallet will be complete once order status is approved/completed from the admin side.
Admin can check all transactions of wallet through backend side

Is this Plugin compatible with the WordPress version 6.0.?

Yes, our Plugin is compatible with WordPress version 6.0.
